channel.title: Websites on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Websites on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
why is the art free?

*the art i is an expression of a trust

i trust my hand on the paper, I trust the people I meet i trust in the value of what I create

when I began offer the portraits for free I was able to draw much more people and I learned people often instinctually decided to donate

I want to give you the option to define the value of the work I want to give you the option to have a piece of art for free I want to trust what i create will support me if I give it to the world
